title: How about kaisa support?
body:
Kaisa can be flexed as support with ap carries like swain,neeko or syndra.

After AP support itemYou rush a zhonya, max W then E and just spam your W on cooldown. Second item will be void stuff..then go for support items like redemption and twin shadows.
You will have W evolved at 2 items...just roam the fuck out of the map and spam W. 
enemy rage quit...GG

replies.body: She has no CC, and her only team utility is vision of a target hit by W. If the enemy tries to kill her carry, what does she do about it?
Builds rylais or frozenmallet problem solved

> [{quoted}](name=Chainman3,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=wNh2Einv,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2019-09-22T11:02:54.647+0000)
>
> Builds rylais or frozenmallet problem solved

Yes, anyone can apply a mild slow after spending a few thousand gold. How is that going to help Kai'Sa save her carry during the first 15 minutes of the game? Is that game going to last more than 15 minutes?
Just play safe the first 15 mins problem solved.

> [{quoted}](name=Chainman3,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=wNh2Einv,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2019-09-22T18:12:55.575+0000)
>
> Just play safe the first 15 mins problem solved.

With no CC, no utility, and no vision because you can't finish the support item quest while playing safe, 15 minutes is when the first surrender call would go out. With good macro and mechanics, you might be able to draw out the game until 20, at which point you can no longer hold your team hostage and they will forfeit. And probably report you for griefing.

They can report all they want. It wont do anything to my account because i get to play the champ i want in the role i want as long as i aim to win. The report wont matter. Ill just win with the next team that actually has the mentality to play the game instead of crying at every chance they get to blame someone else for a loss that isnt decided yet.
